name: horiseon code refactor
briefExplanation: I was given this project with the task of Refactoring the code. I went through the provided code and fixed broken links, made the code DRY, and fixed some css punctuation.

name: static porfolio
briefExplanation: I was tasked with creating a static portfolio from scratch. Using newly acquired skills in HTML5 and CSS3 I build this site from scratch.

name: password generator
briefExplanation: Here I was given the HTML and CSS and tasked with writing the JavaScript. Using Window Prompts, I wrote code that will interact with the user to create a random password.

name: work day scheduler
briefExplanation: Here I built a scheduling app to help it's user's keep track of their busy day

name: Camping Buddy
technologyUsed: html5, css3, javascript, materialize, dom, nps openweather, openlayer, pixabay, jquery, and json
briefExplanation: This was our first group project, my responsibilities were creating the wire frame, researching a new technology to replace bootstrap, and creating the front-end.

name: readme generator
briefExplanation: Here I built a Node Application which uses Inquirer to prompt user input in the Terminal and FS to take the user input to generate a Readme.md file.

name: team profile generator
briefExplanation: Using Node and Inquirer this Application interacts with the user in the Terminal. After answering the prompts this app will generate a profile for the team.

name: employee tracker
briefExplanation: Here we have a Back End App written in JavaScript. Using Node in the Terminal we can interact with a SQL database to keep track of employees.

name: mvc tech blog
technologyUsed: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, Express, Handlebars, MySql2, Sequelize, Jest, and BCrypt.
briefExplanation: Here I used the above technologies to build a Full Stack CMS style blog. You can create an account. Create and Delete your post as well. Still working on editing a post.

name: sports vibes
briefExplanation: A group project where users can create and and link posts together. Other users can then upvote the linked posts based on correlation. My responsibilities included wireframing our website.

name: regex tutorial
briefExplanation: A Gist Tutorial with the Regex Topic: Matching HTML Tags.

name: budget tracker
technologyUsed: Express, Mongoose, MongoDB, Javascript, and service worker

name: book search engine
technologyUsed: MongoDB, Mongoose, Node, Express, and GraphQL
briefExplanation: Given the HTML and CSS as starter code, I was tasked with writing the controllers for the Back End of this application.

name: star talk
technologyUsed: MongoDB, Mongoose, Express, React, and GraphQL

name: Puppy Farm
technologyUsed: HTML5, CSS3, Javascript, Javascript Routes, and Node.js
briefExplanation: Puppy Farm is a Back End Web Application where users can see some basic information on a handful of pups and visit their wiki page if they wish.

name: blue letter boutique
technologyUsed: stripe, react, javascript, sass, dotenv, google firebase, google authentication, imagekit.io, and netlify
briefExplanation: inspired by reddress.com, blue letter boutique is an e-commerce website where its users can login, select, and purchase clothing.

name: knights radiant list
technologyUsed: stripe, react, javascript, sass, dotenv, google firebase, google authentication, imagekit.io, and netlify
briefExplanation: knights radiant list is a simple front end application that allows its users to keep track of warriors from the epic fantasy series: the stormlight archive.
